scripts.copy-descriptors: cp src/host.json dist ; mkdir -p dist/OktaDuoFunction ; cp src/function.json dist/OktaDuoFunction/function.json
scripts.zip: yarn tsc ; yarn copy-descriptors ; yarn install --prod --pure-lockfile --modules-folder dist/node_modules ; (cd dist; zip -r -x "*__tests__*" --symlink idp-hook-updates .;)
